categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Redeye" was the nickname of a clone trooper who lived during the Clone Wars. He was stationed aboard the Coronet to protect Duchess Satine Kryze from assassination attempts. While he was in the cargo bay, he, R2-D2, and fellow trooper Mixer were attacked by assassin probes; he was killed first when an assassin probe snuck up behind him and choked him with its metallic legs. Before Mixer could alert others aboard Coronet of the probes and Redeye's death, he was killed. Later, the probe used his body as a decoy to fool Anakin, but he realized Redeye wasn't alive; the assassin probe then tossed his body at Anakin, which hit a crate and was last seen limp on a box in the cargo bay.

Cloned on the water world of Kamino from the DNA of Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett. Redeye served in the Grand Army of the Republic in the famed 501st Legion during the Clone Wars and was assigned to protect Satine Kryze on boarded the Coronet. While on board the ship Redeye and fellow trooper Mixer were tasked with looking through the cargo bay. While looking through the cargo bay he and Mixer split up, while looking through the cargo bay Redeye was killed by a assassin droid. Later on the assassin droid used Redeye's body to try to trick Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker who then realized Redeye was dead and the assassin droid flung the body at Anakin and hit a crate.
Like his genetic template, Redeye stood at 1.83 meters.

It may have been possible that Redeye had a fear of the dark, as Mixer jokingly told him that the cargo bay was dark, and later, Redeye was shown being worried when he saw something moving in the cargo bay. It turned out to be R2-D2, and Redeye exclaimed his annoyance, seconds before being killed by an assassin probe.
